subject: Re: washinton dc NO.5786
body:

Wow, this is such surprising news! I can't believe my name was among the victims. It's really kind of the US government to do this. 

Could you please tell me more about how this happened? How did they find out that I was a victim? And how did they decide on the amount to be transferred?

Best wishes,
Thomas
